title: How do the new key system work
body: They implemented the honor system im lvl 2 in honor and i hear you recieve keys and i did, but i want to know how it works and is it true that every week u can get 4 keys bcs i taught that u get 8 keys every month can anyone help me

replies.body: You'll still obtain key fragments just as before, and its same restrictions (12 per ~30 days).  The addition is Honor Capsules, which can offer 2 hextech key fragments.  If you don't see any, a relog might get your loot up to date.  Let me know if that clears things up!
oww thx but from the honor capsules i got 4 key fragmnets
if you're honor level 2 then you shouldn't be getting honor capsules yet.
